coll-book_creator_intro: <big>Plus de ''book creator'' you fi create book wey dey contain wiki pages for your choice. You fi export de book for different formats inside (for example PDF or ODF) or order printed copy.</big>
coll-book_creator_help: Spy [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|de help page sake of books]] for more info.
coll-book_creator_disable_text: Dem go disable ''Book creator'' den dem go remove de book wey you dey job for top.
coll-unknown_subpage_text: Dis subpage for [[Special:Book|Book]] no dey exist
coll-couldnotaddarticle_msg: Dem no fi add de wiki page.
coll-couldnotremovearticle_title: Dem no fi comot wiki page
coll-couldnotremovearticle_msg: Dem no fi comot de wiki page.
